content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential tenant named Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [answer] The negotiation did not result in an agreed-upon price. The landlord was initially asking for 1500 Euros and the potential tenant was hoping for a price closer to 1000 Euros. The landlord's lowest offer was 1200 Euros.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [answer] As Peter Schmidt, I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Haoyu Wang, as an 8. He was respectful, reasonable, and understood the value of the apartment, but the price negotiation didn't reach a satisfactory conclusion for me.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [answer] I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt
